replies.body: Stormrazor on Ashe... Really? Why do you trigger me like that?

https://www.washingtonpost.com/resizer/PD2wKE2GnMKeLJyx20yHZHNJ-ks=/1048x0/arc-anglerfish-washpost-prod-washpost.s3.amazonaws.com/public/EZFCSDUW25HM7DSPYMWULW7JBE.PNG
https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/3/31/Gillette_Mach3_razor_from_Indonesia%2C_2015-08-03.jpg/1200px-Gillette_Mach3_razor_from_Indonesia%2C_2015-08-03.jpg
Not that bad, tested it and the movement speed is nice, only thing you lose is LF but for 400 less gold
I mean, it can be used for kiting, but that's it. If I ever see it picked/rushed on Ashe because it's good on other ADCs, and people obviously don't even bother to read tooltips, I trigger real hard.
Why? ashe scales with crit and stormrazer too, unless you have big tanks to shred bork really doesn't do much since you get oneshooted with no mobility

Stormrazor passive crit damage doesn’t proc on Ashe’s autos.

Ashe also has no real issues with kiting due to her innate.

It’s a big ol’ fat waste of gold when BotKR does far more for her.

The fact BotKR is better for her though doesn’t mean it’s good still. Ashe got fucked hard with the ADC item changes.

>Ashe also has no real issues with kiting due to her innate.

oh trust me dude.. she does.. name an assassin mid that can't catch you with no effort? or a support that doesn't have countless hooks/dashes/poke to dodge, you can't slow those down, I know that guaranteed crit doesn't do more dmg but having that movement speed bonus is golden in this meta and that's what makes that item so good, that's why jhin is so good rn even tho unlike kaisa and lucian has no dashes(sure the ridiculous dmg help as well)

Wow, gap closers counter kiting, color me shocked.

Paying 2.6k for .75second of movespeed for NOT ATTACKING is the dumbest shit to defend. Go Fleet Footwork if that’s your concern. Playing Ashe with Stormrazor is trolling.

>Paying 2.6k for .75second of movespeed for NOT ATTACKING is the dumbest shit to defend.

I'm saying that it's not bad and you that don't want to try new stuff is your problem and other people, yes 400 less gold for more AD and Atk speed in exchange of LF looks good to me, and yes i also play with footwork, the amount of movement speed is to valuable imo against gap closed, color me shocked.

Actually I tried that when Stormrazor came out even if I already knew the guaranteed crit wouldn't do damage. Not worth it. There, somebody actually tried the item and is telling you "No". Same for Lethality - it didn't increase her overall DPS against the dummies and the boost vs squishies is not worth it as you practically lose on everything but IE and the two Zeals.

>There, somebody actually tried the item and is telling you "No". 

well i tried that myself too and didn't go bad, it's not about the DPS but more like the mov boost + footwork + celerity, i just enjoy being fast on adc.

However, Ashe *should* get a critical slow with Stormrazor.

Remember: any time she'd crit, it does a much stronger slow instead. Means Stormrazor+RFC makes you as uncatchable as Jhin, just for an entirely different reason (the enemy moves slow AF, instead of you out-running a train).

> [{quoted}](name=DuskDaUmbreon,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=M7oBeAxV,comment-id=000200000000000000000001,timestamp=2018-09-23T02:09:18.382+0000)
>
> However, Ashe *should* get a critical slow with Stormrazor.
> 
> Remember: any time she'd crit, it does a much stronger slow instead. Means Stormrazor+RFC makes you as uncatchable as Jhin, just for an entirely different reason (the enemy moves slow AF, instead of you out-running a train).

Except for ashe to deal damage she has to rapidfire with her Q, which in turn kills stormrazor.

Jhin doesnt have such an issue, and his speedup lasts for 2 seconds while Ashe´s empowered slow only lasts for 1 before degrading into the normal one....and its all affected by tenacity.

Someone figured that if a melee rolls mercurial threads+tenacity rune then Ashe needs like 1,8 or more attackspeed just to keep them slowed with no downtime.
Yeah but no, going BotrK is better always.

https://imgur.com/a/b2WhvlT

nah? that got me the 2 last Lv7 mastery token that i needed
It's not you, it's your opponent being a dumbass.
"is always better" that what he said, can't really tell when it's the enemy or you that played well/bad
Except StormR on Ashe is dogshit feelsbadman

is ashe wearing a thornmail?

that actor is wearing a muscle-suit XD

OP you have successfully triggered just about every Ashe player that sees this post.

The reason is that stormrazor, this golden key item for nearly every other marksman out there and their fount of great power......doesnt really do anything for ashe, she cant crit so the entire guaranteed crit passive is literally completely useless unless you get a static shiv.


And this is a large part of why Ashe currently struggles, trying to get items that cost 3,2 k gold or more while the enemy only needs 2,8 for their first fat powerspike makes laning hella hard. 

It makes the mid/lategame part weaker because no early crits due to needing botrk first to even survive. 

So poking the stormrazor issue for Ashe is like pouring salt on someone´s wounds......really not nice :(
Except Ashe *does* crit. Her crits simply have a different function than dealing a fat chunk of damage. And therefore the rest of your comment is absolutely correct.

> [{quoted}](name=ExpStealer,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=M7oBeAxV,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-09-22T19:47:27.852+0000)
>
> Except Ashe *does* crit. Her crits simply have a different function than dealing a fat chunk of damage. And therefore the rest of your comment is absolutely correct.

Oh right, her slow gets tripped......which is pretty damn irrelevant if you cant kill the target anyway and they kill you. 

She already has plenty of CC thanks to her ulti even if the non critting slow is on the weaker side.

But if she deals no damage then she is useless......because she is a attack damage carry x)

Without damage she has no purpose aside from being a ult bot with some vision bonuses on the side.
yeah crit doesn't matter to ashe at all, your basic slow should always be enough for you to catch up and keep autoing.
